title: ACTREC Recruitment 2025 - Walk-in interview for Senior Research Fellow Posts
description: The Advanced Centre for Treatment Research and Education in Cancer (ACTREC) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 01 Senior Research Fellow Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their M.E./M. Tech, and M. Sc can apply for the ACTREC Recruitment 2025. The interested applicants can attend the walk-in interview. Here we have mentioned the education ...
